EventActionDisplayValue.TargetDataDefinition: If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 1, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000*') + ' ----- ', If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 0 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 1, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000 ') + ' ----- ', If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 0, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000* ') + format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVs], '+0000;-0000') , format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000 ') + format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVs], '+0000;-0000') )))

If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 1, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000*') + ' --.--', If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 0 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 1, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000 ') + ' --.--', If([LVAR:I_FCU_ALTITUDE_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVsDashed] == 0, format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000* ') + format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVs], '+0.0;-0.0') , format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuAlt], '00000 ') + format ([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuVs], '+0.0;-0.0') )))

If([LVAR:I_FCU_SPEED_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuSpdDashed] == 1, '---*', If([LVAR:I_FCU_SPEED_MANAGED] == 0 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuSpdDashed] == 1, '---', If([LVAR:I_FCU_SPEED_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuSpdDashed] == 0, format([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuSpd], '000*' ), format([LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuSpd], '000 ' ))))

If([LVAR:I_FCU_HEADING_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdgDashed] == 1, '---*', If([LVAR:I_FCU_HEADING_MANAGED] == 0 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdgDashed] == 1, '---', If([LVAR:I_FCU_HEADING_MANAGED] == 1 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdgDashed] == 0, format( [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdg], '000*' ), If([LVAR:I_FCU_HEADING_MANAGED] == 0 and [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdgDashed] == 0, format( [LVAR:FNX2PLD_fcuHdg], '000' ), ''))))
